content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_custom_heading text=”ADR Chambers offers high quality professional development through its training division, the Stitt Feld Handy Group.” font_container=”tag:p|font_size:28px|text_align:left|line_height:36px” google_fonts=”font_family:Lato%3A100%2C100italic%2C300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:300%20light%20regular%3A300%3Anormal” css=”.vc_custom_1495831635495{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_column_text]The Stitt Feld Handy Group offers workshops in:

  • alternative dispute resolution;
  • negotiation;
  • mediation;
  • dealing with difficult people;
  • having difficult conversations;
  • workplace coaching;
  • and customer service.

The Stitt Feld Handy Group provides in-person and online workshops to the public. Participants receive certificates from the University of Windsor’s Faculty of Law. The Stitt Feld Handy Group also provides customized training, from focused one-day programs to in-depth multi-day workshops. Customized training can also include an online component and customized follow-up.

Stitt Feld Handy Group instructors are all experienced mediators, negotiators and coaches who have taught workshops throughout Canada and around the world.

To find out more, visit the Stitt Feld Handy Group.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ el_class=”hidden-print”][vc_btn title=”Request More Information About Training” style=”custom” custom_background=”#dd0046″ custom_text=”#ffffff” shape=”square” align=”center” i_icon_fontawesome=”fa fa-info-circle” button_block=”true” add_icon=”true” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fsfhgroup.com%2Fcontact-us%2F||target:%20_blank|”][vc_custom_heading text=”Other ADR Services” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”menu-header”][vc_wp_custommenu nav_menu=”66″][/vc_column][/vc_row]
